amendment.description: Amendment sought to expand the ability of an aggrieved party to file suit for either declaratory or injunctive relief from 2 days to 5 days; provide for an expedited appeals process to the United States District Court for matters rising out of the special election process; and provide for an expansion of the right to sue for declaratory judgment to others beyond a state Governor.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 109-10.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 239 (Roll no. 50).
